actions.name: AssociateApi
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a GraphQL API to a custom domain name in AppSync

actions.name: AssociateMergedGraphqlApi
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a merged API to a source API

actions.name: AssociateSourceGraphqlApi
actions.description: Grants permission to associate a source API to a merged API

actions.name: CreateApiCache
actions.description: Grants permission to create an API cache in AppSync

actions.name: CreateApiKey
actions.description: Grants permission to create a unique key that you can distribute to clients who are executing your API

actions.name: CreateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to create a data source

actions.name: CreateDomainName
actions.description: Grants permission to create a custom domain name in AppSync

actions.name: CreateFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new function

actions.name: CreateGraphqlApi
actions.description: Grants permission to create a GraphQL API, which is the top level AppSync resource

actions.name: CreateResolver
actions.description: Grants permission to create a resolver. A resolver converts incoming requests into a format that a data source can understand, and converts the data source's responses into GraphQL

actions.name: CreateType
actions.description: Grants permission to create a type

actions.name: DeleteApiCache
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an API cache in AppSync

actions.name: DeleteApiKey
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an API key

actions.name: DeleteDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a data source

actions.name: DeleteDomainName
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a custom domain name in AppSync

actions.name: DeleteFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a function

actions.name: DeleteGraphqlApi
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a GraphQL Api. This will also clean up every AppSync resource below that API

actions.name: DeleteResolver
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a resolver

actions.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a resource policy

actions.name: DeleteType
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a type

actions.name: DisassociateApi
actions.description: Grants permission to detach a GraphQL API to a custom domain name in AppSync

actions.name: DisassociateMergedGraphqlApi
actions.description: Grants permission to remove an associated source API from a merged API identified by the source API

actions.name: DisassociateSourceGraphqlApi
actions.description: Grants permission to remove an associated source API from a merged API identified by the merged API

actions.name: EvaluateCode
actions.description: Grants permission to evaluate code with a runtime and context

actions.name: EvaluateMappingTemplate
actions.description: Grants permission to evaluate template mapping

actions.name: FlushApiCache
actions.description: Grants permission to flush an API cache in AppSync

actions.name: GetApiAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to read custom domain name - GraphQL API association details in AppSync

actions.name: GetApiCache
actions.description: Grants permission to read information about an API cache in AppSync

actions.name: GetDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a data source

actions.name: GetDomainName
actions.description: Grants permission to read information about a custom domain name in AppSync

actions.name: GetFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a function

actions.name: GetGraphqlApi
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a GraphQL API

actions.name: GetIntrospectionSchema
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the introspection schema for a GraphQL API

actions.name: GetResolver
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a resolver

actions.name: GetResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to read a resource policy

actions.name: GetSchemaCreationStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the current status of a schema creation operation

actions.name: GetSourceApiAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to read information about a merged API associated source API

actions.name: GetType
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve a type

actions.name: GraphQL
actions.description: Grants permission to send a GraphQL query to a GraphQL API

actions.name: ListApiKeys
actions.description: Grants permission to list the API keys for a given API

actions.name: ListDataSources
actions.description: Grants permission to list the data sources for a given API

actions.name: ListDomainNames
actions.description: Grants permission to enumerate custom domain names in AppSync

actions.name: ListFunctions
actions.description: Grants permission to list the functions for a given API

actions.name: ListGraphqlApis
actions.description: Grants permission to list GraphQL APIs

actions.name: ListResolvers
actions.description: Grants permission to list the resolvers for a given API and type

actions.name: ListResolversByFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to list the resolvers that are associated with a specific function

actions.name: ListSourceApiAssociations
actions.description: Grants permission to list source APIs associated to a given merged API

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

actions.name: ListTypes
actions.description: Grants permission to list the types for a given API

actions.name: ListTypesByAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to list the types for a given merged API and source API association

actions.name: PutResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to set a resource policy

actions.name: SetWebACL
actions.description: Grants permission to set a web ACL

actions.name: SourceGraphQL
actions.description: Grants permission to send a GraphQL query to a source API of a merged API

actions.name: StartSchemaCreation
actions.description: Grants permission to add a new schema to your GraphQL API. This operation is asynchronous - GetSchemaCreationStatus can show when it has completed

actions.name: StartSchemaMerge
actions.description: Grants permission to initiate a schema merge for a given merged API and associated source API

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

actions.name: UpdateApiCache
actions.description: Grants permission to update an API cache in AppSync

actions.name: UpdateApiKey
actions.description: Grants permission to update an API key for a given API

actions.name: UpdateDataSource
actions.description: Grants permission to update a data source

actions.name: UpdateDomainName
actions.description: Grants permission to update a custom domain name in AppSync

actions.name: UpdateFunction
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing function

actions.name: UpdateGraphqlApi
actions.description: Grants permission to update a GraphQL API

actions.name: UpdateResolver
actions.description: Grants permission to update a resolver

actions.name: UpdateSourceApiAssociation
actions.description: Grants permission to update a merged API source API association

actions.name: UpdateType
actions.description: Grants permission to update a type
